member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: This class is providing various string extension methods.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the hash value of the input string to string type.
member.returns: Returns the hash value of the input as a string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: This method checks whether the input string contains string true values.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the input string to short type.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the input string to integer type.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the input string to long type.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the input string to DateTime type.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: This method is capitalizing the input string first letter.
member.returns: Returns the input string with first letter capitalized.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method is gets the string between start string and end string in the input string.
member.param: The start substring in the input string.
The end substring in the input string.
The start position in the input string.
member.returns: Returns a substring of the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertBulgarianToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts bulgarian letters to latin in the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToBulgarianKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the latin letters to bulgarian in the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the input string to valid user name.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the input string to valid latin file name.
member.returns: Returns a valid latin file name.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method is finding the first characters in the input string.
member.param: Chars count in the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: This method is finding the file extension in the file name.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the input string to content type.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts the input string to byte array.
